title: *FREE APP* Minutes to Mall, Pool, Next to Freeway
posting_body: Serene Village is located just in north Lynnwood and we are minutes to Boeing .
We have a great mix of spacious 1-2 bedroom units.
Every unit has a washer/dryer to save or residents time and money.
We have some covered parking stalls, to protect your car from the weather.
Stay in shape by using our modern fitness center.
Children will love our sprawling lawns and playground.
On a chilly evening enjoy a cozy fire, right in your living room.
On those warm summer days, swim some laps in our seasonally heated pool.
Every unit has a private deck or patio.
We even offer storage units, for all those extra items you just can't seem to part with.
If you are a clothes lover, you will love our walk in closets.
Lynnwood, Seattle's suburb, is known for its shopping (Alderwood Mall).
Serene Village is surrounded by great shopping and restaurants.
We offer spacious living and a convenient location.
Features:
Carport
Private Deck/Patio
Storage
Walk In Closets
Washer/Dryer
Playground
Fire Place
Fitness Center
Cabana
